original: intros x ys1 ys2 Hperm. induction Hperm. - apply derivable_iffp_refl. - simpl. apply Mono. apply IHHperm. - simpl. rewrite Assoc. rewrite <- Assoc. apply Comm. - etransitivity. ++ apply IHHperm1. ++ apply IHHperm2.
